scripts.monsterpedia: squoosh-cli --mozjpeg monsterpedia --output-dir monsterpedia_temp && rmdir /S /Q monsterpedia && ren monsterpedia_temp monsterpedia
scripts.monstiepedia: squoosh-cli --mozjpeg auto monstiepedia --output-dir monstiepedia_temp rmdir /S /Q monstiepedia && ren monstiepedia_temp monstiepedia
scripts.squoosh: npm run icons && npm run monsterpedia && npm run monstiepedia
